entity.name: Face the Nation
entity.description: "Face the Nation," which is one of the longest-running news programs on the air, offers insight and analysis on the top issues of the day. Moderator Margaret Brennan welcomes politicians, government leaders and international newsmakers to a roundtable discussion of current events with CBS News correspondents.
